alert.note: Alert for Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 7:36PM CDT until July 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR PERKINS AND KEITH COUNTIES... At 635 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Keystone to 10 miles south of Roscoe to 9 miles southeast of Barton, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Grant, Paxton, Brule, Madrid, Lemoyne, Keystone, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Eagle Gulch Campground, Ruthon, Brandon, Nevens, Megeath, Broganville, Otter Creek Campground, Lake View Campground, Big Bald Hill, Wild Horse Spring and Belmar. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 59 and 105. Highway 92 between mile markers 122 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 110 and 148. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
